attributes.action: HMRC Deal with Rangers FC (In Adminstration)
attributes.additional_details:
If HMRC cut a deal that allows Rangers FC (In Administration) to escape with a low pence in the pound deal, thereby denying the taxpayer significant monies, the government have to establish just who's interest HMRC are acting in and intervene.

In this time of austerity it is important for the public to see that companies are being pursued to the full extent of the law for ALL monies owed.
